hadiths.text: (Narrated Tamim ad-Dari: Tamim asked: Messenger of Allah), what is the sunnah about a man who accepts Islam by advice and persuasion of a Muslim? He replied: He is the nearest to him in life and in death

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يُسْلِمُ عَلَى يَدَىِ الرَّجُلِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Man Who Accepts Islam At The Hands Of Another
